SIXTEENTH STREET. N
Mr. William G. Harley
Director, Television
University of Wisconsin
Madison, Wisconsin
H I N C T 0 S
Dear Bill:
Let me hasten to make an honest woman of your secretary and to confess
ray inefficiency.
The day after you were here last week Harold Wigren brought in the
material you had sent me in relation to the .Joint NAEB - DAVI film
project. I bad passed this material on to Harold when I received
it in December 11 and asked him for his recommendations. Harold
did not have an opportunity to study the material and passed it
back to me when he left last week for Houston.
At the first opportunity I shall study this material and probably
pass it on to our Television Committee for their consideration
during our convention in Cincinnati.
Very truly yours,
Robert C. Snider
Assistant Executive Secretary
